name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lica: Screen Recorder and Video Creator

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform rough screen recordings into engaging product explainer videos and presentations in one click. Make your first take theâ€¦

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform rough screen recordings into engaging product explainer videos and presentations in one click. Make your first take the best take - Lica will automatically translate it into a polished video by trimming unnecessary clips, generating dynamic title overlays, transitions and zooms, AI voice overs and more. Perfect for product teams, customer success, and sales demos. Show your product at its best, every time!
